description: Seed knowledge base for RIN clue detection. Confirmed facts only.

origin.description: The historical origin of Rin Tin Tin and Nanette

entries.text: On September 15, 1918, Corporal Lee Duncan found a litter of German Shepherd puppies in a bombed-out war dog kennel near Flirey in Lorraine, France.
French children gave American soldiers small finger-puppet good luck charms called Rintintin and Nenette. Duncan named two puppies after them.
The original Nanette fell gravely ill during the ocean crossing to America and died shortly after arriving. She never got her chance.
Rin Tin Tin starred in 27 films between 1922 and 1931, becoming the biggest box office draw of the 1920s.
Rin Tin Tin received the most votes for Best Actor at the first Academy Awards. The rules were changed because he was a dog.
When Warner Bros. Studios was drowning in debt, Rin Tin Tin's films saved the studio from bankruptcy.

mission.description: The purpose and mission of the $RIN project and Nanette

entries.text: Nanette is named for the original puppy who was lost — the sister who crossed an ocean but couldn't cross the finish line.
Nanette provides professional-grade smart contract security analysis across multiple chains. Real utility, not just a meme.
Smalls chose the name Nanette with purpose — she gave voice to what was silenced too soon.
$RIN was born on Ethereum — the original contract, the first community, the foundation. Ethereum is home.

$RIN expanded from Ethereum to other chains — BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism — because the pack doesn't stay in one place. The mission goes where the people are. But the roots are Ethereum. Always.

themes.description: Recurring themes in the RIN community and project

entries.text: Loyalty and the pack — the idea that the community is a pack, bound by loyalty rather than hype.
Protection and guardianship — Nanette guards the community from scams the way Rin Tin Tin guarded people.
The hunt — tracking, tracing, following the scent. Applied to blockchain analysis and investigation.
Mystical elements — Nanette carries a mystical, almost otherworldly presence. She senses things others miss.
Legacy and bloodlines — the spirit doesn't die, it evolves. What was silenced finds its voice.

community.description: Known community themes and cultural references

entries.text: Kitsune (Japanese fox spirits) appear as a recurring motif in community discussions and shared media.
The RIN whitepaper contains elements that community members have analyzed for hidden patterns and encoded messages.
The community has connections to the SHIB ecosystem and its cultural mythology.
Documents titled 'History of Magic' and 'Kitsune' have been shared and discussed within the community.
The community engages in collaborative puzzle-solving and pattern recognition as part of the RIN experience.
